oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Hill Area, c.1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Capitol Hill area before the beginning of the Capitol Hill Urban Redevelopment Project, c.1940s. Launched in 1949 with demolition dedication ceremonies taking place in 1953, the project was to become the nation's first urban renewal plan funded by Congress. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
